html:
KEH Camera is having their annual Black Friday sale, and you can save 10% off of used Canon gear with the coupon code BFCM24 (*Excludes New, LN, and LN- grades). They already have a used Canon EOS R5 Mark II body available for only $3599.

You can have trust in the KEH rating system and they back their used gear with a 180-day warranty on most condition ratings.

Canon EOS R Cameras

  • Canon EOS R5 Mark II $3599
  • Canon EOS R5 C $2654
  • Canon Cinema EOS C70 $3059
  • Canon EOS R5 $1921
  • Canon EOS R6 Mark II $1691

Canon RF Lenses

  • Canon RF 15-35mm f/2.8L IS USM $1546
  • Canon RF 24-70mm f/2.8L IS USM $1960
  • Canon RF 28-70mm f/2L USM $2441
  • Canon RF 24-105mm f/2.8L IS USM $2600
  • Canon RF 70-200mm f/2.8L IS USM $2128
  • Canon RF 100-500mm f/4.5-7.1L IS USM $2154

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
